ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Van Allen Probe B Energetic Particle, Composition, and Thermal Plasma Suite (ECT) Helium Oxygen Proton Electron Electrostatic Analyzer (HOPE) Spin-Resolved Science Data. Electron >200 eV and Ion >30 eV Plasma Moments measured at Apogee in Alternate Spin Cadence, Level 3, Release #4 (L3), 24.35 s Data

RevisionEvent.Note: Only known prior ReleaseDate of the metadata

Added DOI and PublicationInfo minted by LFB, updated InformationURL URLs as needed, updated the SPDF MetadataContact Person to Robert M. Candey, metadata updated to SPASE 2.4.1, reviewed by LFB 20220818

ResourceHeader.Description: Van Allen Probe B, Energetic Particle, Composition, and Thermal Plasma Suite, ECT, Helium Oxygen Proton Electron, HOPE, Mass Spectrometer Spin Resolution Science Data. Plasma Moments from Electrons >200 eV and Ions >30 eV measured at Apogee in alternate Spin Cadence.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: H.O. Funsten, R. Skoug, B.A. Larsen, R. Friedel. Distribute freely, please acknowledge the original Principal Investigator. Please contact the Principal Investigator before any publication or Presentation of Data.

PublicationInfo.Authors: Funsten, H.O., R.M. Skoug, B.A. Larsen, and R. Friedel

Parameter.Name: Data Quality Flag, Proton Temperature
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH_ION
Parameter.Description: Data Quality Flag, Proton Temperature
Parameter.Caveats: This Parameter is used to flag suspicious Proton Temperature Values

Parameter.Name: Data Quality Flag, Helium Temperature
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH_ION
Parameter.Description: Data Quality Flag, Helium Temperature
Parameter.Caveats: This Parameter is used to flag suspicious Helium Temperature Values

Parameter.Name: Data Quality Flag, Oxygen Temperature
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH_ION
Parameter.Description: Data Quality Flag, Oxygen Temperature
Parameter.Caveats: This Parameter is used to flag suspicious Oxygen Temperature Values

Parameter.Name: Data Quality Flag, Electron Temperature
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH_ELE
Parameter.Description: Data Quality Flag, Electron Temperature
Parameter.Caveats: This Parameter is used to flag suspicious Electron Temperature Values

Parameter.Name: Data Quality Flag, Proton Tperp Consistency
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH_ION
Parameter.Description: Data Quality Flag, Proton Perpendicular Temperature, Tperp, Consistency
Parameter.Caveats: This Parameter is used to flag Proton Perpendicular Temperature Measurements if the Ratio of consecutive Temperature Values are outside the Range of 0.5 to 1.5

Parameter.Name: Data Quality Flag, Helium Tperp Consistency
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH_ION
Parameter.Description: Data Quality Flag, Helium Perpendicular Temperature, Tperp, Consistency
Parameter.Caveats: This Parameter is used to flag Helium Perpendicular Temperature Measurements if the Ratio of consecutive Temperature Values are outside the Range of 0.5 to 1.5

Parameter.Name: Data Quality Flag, Oxygen Tperp Consistency
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH_ION
Parameter.Description: Data Quality Flag, Oxygen Perpendicular Temperature, Tperp, Consistency
Parameter.Caveats: This Parameter is used to flag Oxygen Perpendicular Temperature Measurements if the Ratio of consecutive Temperature Values are outside the Range of 0.5 to 1.5

Parameter.Name: Data Quality Flag, Electron Tperp Consistency
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH_ELE
Parameter.Description: Data Quality Flag, Electron Perpendicular Temperature, Tperp, Consistency
Parameter.Caveats: This Parameter is used to flag Electron Perpendicular Temperature Measurements if the Ratio of consecutive Temperature Values are outside the Range of 0.5 to 1.5

Parameter.Name: Data Quality Flag, Proton Density
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH_ION
Parameter.Description: Data Quality Flag, Proton Density
Parameter.Caveats: This Parameter is used to flag suspicious Proton Density Values

Parameter.Name: Data Quality Flag, Helium Density
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH_ION
Parameter.Description: Data Quality Flag, Helium Density
Parameter.Caveats: This Parameter is used to flag suspicious Helium Density Values

Parameter.Name: Data Quality Flag, Oxygen Density
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH_ION
Parameter.Description: Data Quality Flag, Oxygen Density
Parameter.Caveats: This Parameter is used to flag suspicious Oxygen Density Values

Parameter.Name: Data Quality Flag, Electron Density
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH_ELE
Parameter.Description: Data Quality Flag, Electron Density
Parameter.Caveats: This Parameter is used to flag suspicious Electron Density Values

Parameter.Name: Spacecraft Position Vector, Geographic Cartesian Coordinates
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH_ION
Parameter.Description: Spacecraft Position Vector, Geographic, GEO, Cartesian Coordinates
Parameter.Caveats: The Origin is the Center of Mass of the Earth. The X-Axis points to the Intersection of the Greenwich Meridian and Geographic Equator. The Z Axis points to the Geographic North Pole. The Y Axis completes the Right-Handed Cartesian Triad with Y = -X × Z. Average Type: standard

Parameter.Name: Roederer L* generalized L Shell Parameter
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH_ION
Parameter.Description: Roederer L* generalized L Shell Parameter
Parameter.Caveats: Calculated by using the LANLGeoMag Software Library. Internal Magnetic Field Model: International Geomagnetic Reference Field, IGRF. External Magnetic Field Model: Olson-Pfitzer 1977 Quiet, OP77Q. Average Type: standard

Parameter.Name: McIlwain L Shell Parameter
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH_ION
Parameter.Description: McIlwain L Shell Parameter
Parameter.Caveats: Calculated by using the LANLGeoMag Software Library. Internal Magnetic Field Model: International Geomagnetic Reference Field, IGRF. External Magnetic Field Model: Olson-Pfitzer 1977 Quiet, OP77Q. Average Type: standard

Parameter.Name: Model Magnetic Field Magnitude, Equatorial
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH_ION
Parameter.Description: Model Magnetic Field Magnitude at the Magnetic Equator
Parameter.Caveats: Calculated by using the LANLGeoMag Software Library. Internal Magnetic Field Model: International Geomagnetic Reference Field, IGRF. External Magnetic Field Model: Olson-Pfitzer 1977 Quiet, OP77Q. Average Type: standard

Parameter.Name: Second Adiabatic Invariant, Bounce
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH_ION
Parameter.Description: Second Adiabatic Invariant, Bounce
Parameter.Caveats: Calculated by using the LANLGeoMag Software Library. Internal Magnetic Field Model: International Geomagnetic Reference Field, IGRF. External Magnetic Field Model: Olson-Pfitzer 1977 Quiet, OP77Q. Average Type: standard

Parameter.Name: Spacecraft Position, Magnetic Local Time
Parameter.Set: Time Series defined by using: EPOCH_ION
Parameter.Description: Spacecraft Position, Magnetic Local Time, MLT, in Hours
Parameter.Caveats: Calculated by using the LANLGeoMag Software Library. Internal Magnetic Field Model: International Geomagnetic Reference Field, IGRF. External Magnetic Field Model: Olson-Pfitzer 1977 Quiet, OP77Q. Average Type: standard
